ops_per_clock_notes.fp32: 64 cores x 4 FP32/cycle (NEON 128-bit) x 2 (FMA) = 512 FP32 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.fp64: 64 cores x 2 FP64/cycle (NEON) x 2 (FMA) = 256 FP64 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.fp16: 64 cores x 8 FP16/cycle (NEON) x 2 (FMA) = 1,024 FP16 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.bf16: 64 cores x 8 BF16/cycle (NEON) x 2 (FMA) = 1,024 BF16 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.int8: 64 cores x 16 INT8/cycle (NEON) x 2 = 2,048 INT8 ops/clock

theoretical_peaks_notes: Legacy field - calculated at boost_clock_mhz (2600 MHz). Use ops_per_clock x clock_mhz for accurate peaks.
notes: AWS Graviton3 ARM processor. 64 Neoverse V1 cores. TSMC 5nm. BF16 support for ML workloads. DDR5 memory. Powers AWS C7g, M7g, R7g instances. 25% better performance than Graviton2.
